## Outline

Here the use of various Forest Research (FR) Decision Support System (DSS) tool API endpoints are documented for R and Python.

:::

:::{}

## ESC

The Ecological Site Classification (ESC) API endpoints are constructed using [FastAPI](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/), the 
OpenAPI documentation can be found [here](http://209.97.132.245:8000/docs).

Current endpoints include:

* ESCSiteData
* ESCTreeResults
* ESCTreeModel
* ESCWCC

The current version is **v0.6**.

:::
